data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Kingman Reef, United States Minor Outlying Islands to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 60 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kingman Reef, United States Minor Outlying Islands
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Kingman Reef, United States Minor Outlying Islands.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Kingman Reef who will make disciples who make disciples.
Spirit, encourage the church of Kingman Reef, United States Minor Outlying Islands that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Kingman Reef, United States Minor Outlying Islands by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: the state of Kingman Reef has (about) 40 people who know Jesus, 58 people who know about him culturally, and 2 people who are far from Jesus.
Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Kingman Reef, United States Minor Outlying Islands and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.focus_label: Kingman Reef, United States Minor Outlying Islands
data.section_summary:
the state of Kingman Reef, United States Minor Outlying Islands has a population of 100.

We estimate Kingman Reef has 40 people who might know Jesus, 58 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who need Jesus.
